t: Amplify Snack Brands | LinkedIn
s: Amplify Snack Brands, owned by Hershey, is a fast growing “better-for-you” (BFY) snack brand company based in Austin, Texas. Led by a team of world-class executives, the company produces guilt-free snacking products and prides itself in having products that taste great with simple ingredients.
